Question: This person was named deputy commander of the invasion at the last minute, leaving him with little say in the planning.
Hints: This person was described by childhood friends as active and assertive, protective of his sisters and a skilled athlete.
This person remained at his command in Riyadh through December, making frequent frontline visits to the troops.
